Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by New York (A) in 2011...
Injured on 4/10/2011 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 5/18/2012 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/5/2015, off Aaron Laffey (KCA)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/19/2015, off Wynn Pelzer (TB)...
Won World Championship with New York (A) in 2016...
Traded from New York (A) to Cleveland on 4/21/2018 (Going to CLE: DH R. Raburn, RF M. Mahtook, P K. Gausman. Going to NYA: SS R. Pierson, RF A. Presley)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/9/2019, hitting .385 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/16/2020, hitting .483 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Traded from Cleveland to Baltimore on 2/5/2021 (Going to CLE: RF J. Vosmik Jr.. Going to BAL: LF M. Mahtook)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/6/2021, hitting .450 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
